layout: post
title: "The land of the ten headed warrior - Lanka"
categories:
  -  Sri Lanka
tags:
  - Colombo
  - Sri Lanka
image: images/2015-07-09-the-land-of-the-ten-headed-warrior-lanka/DSC_7089.jpg
---

> To Isha, the person who made me fill the form!

An uneventful summer. An amazing opportunity. A traveler.

Each one of us dream of flying. If only I had wings you hear more often than not. This is the story of my first fly over the seas. This is the tale of my visit to the kingdom of Ravana, someone whom I had adored since my childhood. This is the story of my visit to Sri Lanka.

Finally the day dawned. Going about telling everyone about the upcoming adventure. Packing all the stuff and heading to the airport was a festival of its own.
